Package com.dsr.proxy_server.service

Class ProxyServersManagerService

java.lang.Object
com.dsr.proxy_server.service.ProxyServersManagerService
@Service
public class ProxyServersManagerService
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains the logic that's connected with proxy servers add/get operations.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ProxyServersManagerService​(org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate restTemplate, CountryService countryService, ProxyMaintenanceService proxyMaintenanceService, ProxyServerRepository proxyServerRepository, ProxyResultItemMapper proxyResultItemMapper, ProxyServerCreationDtoMapper proxyServerCreationDtoMapper)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ProxyServerCreationResponseDto addProxyServerByRequest​(ProxyServerCreationDto proxyServerCreationDto)
    This method adds proxy server to database (getting data about proxy server from post request)
    void checkAllServers()
    This method gets all the proxy servers and analyzes them: if the server is not in the database, add it if the availability of the server in the db is incorrect, update it
    PageDto<ProxyServer> getAll​(PageRequestDto pageRequest)
    This method returns all the available proxy servers in the form of page

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • ProxyServersManagerService

  • Method Details

    • checkAllServers

      @Transactional public void checkAllServers()
      This method gets all the proxy servers and analyzes them: if the server is not in the database, add it if the availability of the server in the db is incorrect, update it

    • addProxyServerByRequest

      @Transactional public ProxyServerCreationResponseDto addProxyServerByRequest​(ProxyServerCreationDto proxyServerCreationDto)
      This method adds proxy server to database (getting data about proxy server from post request)
      Parameters:
      proxyServerCreationDto - entity of type ProxyServerCreationDto

    • getAll

      public PageDto<ProxyServer> getAll​(PageRequestDto pageRequest)
      This method returns all the available proxy servers in the form of page
      Parameters:
      pageRequest - entity of type PageRequestDto
      Returns:
      list of entities of type PageDto
